plot: Undercover federal agents pressure Connie to over share embarrassing personal details with the public. 'The TMI' is from the second season of the web series Potty Talk: smart sketch comedy from women who break the rules.
title: Potty Talk Presents... The TMI
plot_es: Undercover federal agents pressure Connie to over share embarrassing personal details with the public. 'The TMI' is from the second season of the web series Potty Talk: smart sketch comedy from women who break the rules.
